analyzed: śāntipāṭaḥ

original: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ bhadraṃ
analyzed: om bhadram karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ bhadram
paśyema akṣabhiḥ yajatrāḥ
sthiraiḥ aṅgaiḥ tuṣṭuvām saḥ tanūbhiḥ vi aśema deva hitam yat āyuḥ

original: svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ /
analyzed: svasti naḥ indraḥ vṛddha śravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśva vedāḥ

original: svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatir dadhātu //
analyzed: svasti naḥ tārkṣyaḥ ariṣṭa nemiḥ svasti naḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dadhātu
om śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ
om pūrṇam adaḥ pūrṇam idam pūrṇāt pūrṇam udacyate
pūrṇasya pūrṇam ādāya pūrṇam eva avaśiṣyate
om śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ
māṇḍūkyaḥ upaniṣad
verse
om iti etat akṣaram idam sarvam tasya upavyākhyānam bhūtam
bhavat bhaviṣyat iti sarvam oṅkāraḥ eva
yat ca anyat tri kāla atītam tat api oṅkāraḥ eva
verse

original: sarvaṃ hyetad brahmāyamātmā brahma so 'yamātmā catuṣpāt //
analyzed: sarvam hi etat brahma ayam ātmā brahma saḥ yam ātmā catuṣpād
verse
jāgarita sthānaḥ bahis prajñaḥ sapta aṅgaḥ
ekonaviṃśati mukhaḥ sthūlabhuj vaiśvānaraḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ
verse
svapna sthānaḥ ntar prajñaḥ sapta aṅgaḥ ekonaviṃśati mukhaḥ
praviviktabhuktaijasaḥ dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
verse

original: yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na
analyzed: yatra suptaḥ na kañcana kāmam kāmayate na
kañcana svapnam paśyati tat suṣuptam
suṣupta sthāne ekībhūtaḥ prajñāna ghanaḥ eva ānanda mayaḥ
hi ānandabhuj cetomukhaḥ prājñaḥ tṛtīyaḥ pādah
verse
eṣa sarva īśvaraḥ eṣa sarvajñaḥ eṣaḥ ntaryāmī eṣa
yoniḥ sarvasya prabhava apyayau hi bhūtānām
māṇḍūkya kārikā
verse

original: bahiḥ prajño vibhurviśvo hyantaḥ prajñastu taijasaḥ /
analyzed: bahis prajñaḥ vibhuḥ viśvaḥ hi antar prajñaḥ tu taijasaḥ

original: ghanaprajñastathā prājña eka eva tridhā smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: ghana prajñaḥ tathā prājñaḥ ekaḥ eva tridhā smṛtaḥ
verse
dakṣiṇa akṣi mukhe viśvaḥ manasyantaḥ tu taijasaḥ

original: ākāśe ca hydi prājñastridhā dehe vyavasthitaḥ //
analyzed: ākāśe ca prājñaḥ tridhā dehe vyavasthitaḥ
verse
viśvaḥ hi sthūla bhuj nityam taijasaḥ pravivikta bhuj
ānanda bhuj tathā prājñaḥ tridhā bhogam nibodhata
verse

original: sthūlaṃ tarpayate viśvaṃ praviviktaṃ tu taijasam /
analyzed: sthūlam tarpayate viśvam praviviktam tu taijasam

original: ānandaśca tathā prājñaṃ tridhā tṛptiṃ nibodhata //
analyzed: ānandaḥ ca tathā prājñam tridhā tṛptim nibodhata
verse

original: triṣu dhāmasu yadbhojyaṃ bhoktā yaśca prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: triṣu dhāmasu yat bhojyam bhoktā yaḥ ca prakīrtitaḥ

original: vedaitadubhayaṃ yastu sa bhuñjāno na lipyate //
analyzed: veda etat ubhayam yaḥ tu sa bhuñjānaḥ na lipyate
verse
prabhavaḥ sarva bhāvānām satām iti viniścayaḥ
sarvam janayati prāṇaḥ ca ūm puruṣaḥ pṛthak
verse
vibhūtim prasavam tu anye manyante sṛṣṭi cintakāḥ
svapnam āyāsa rūpā iti sṛṣṭiḥ anyaiḥ vikalpitā
verse
icchā mātram prabhoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ iti sṛṣṭau viniścitāḥ
kālāt prasūtim bhūtānām manyante kāla cintakāḥ
verse
bhoga artham sṛṣṭiḥ iti anye krīḍā artham iti ca apare
devasya eṣa svābhāvaḥ yam āpta kāmasya kā spṛhā
māṇḍūkyaḥ upaniṣad
verse

original: nāntaḥ prajñaṃ na bahiḥ prajñaṃ nobhayataḥ prajñaṃ
analyzed: na antar prajñam na bahis prajñam na ubhayatas prajñam
na prajñāna ghanam na prajñam na aprajñam
a dṛśyam a vyavahāryam a grāhyam a lakṣaṇam a cintyam a vyapa
deśyam eka ātma pratyaya sāram prapañca upaśamam śāntam

original: śivamadvaitaṃ caturthaṃ manyante sa ātmā sa vijñeyaḥ //
analyzed: śivam advaitam caturtham manyante saḥ ātmā sa vijñeyaḥ
māṇḍūkya kārikā
verse
nivṛtteḥ sarva duḥkhānām īśānaḥ prabhuḥ avyayaḥ
advaitaḥ sarva bhāvānām devaḥ turyaḥ vibhuḥ smṛtaḥ
verse
kārya kāraṇa baddhau tau iṣyete viśva taijasau

original: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhastu dvau tau turye na siddhytaḥ //
analyzed: prājñaḥ kāraṇa baddhaḥ tu dvau tau turye na siddhytaḥ
verse

original: nātmānaṃ na paraṃ caiva na satyaṃ nāpi cānṛtam /
analyzed: na ātmānam na param ca eva na satyam na api ca anṛtam
prājñaḥ kiñcana saṃvetti turyam tat sarva dṛś sadā
verse
dvaitasya agrahaṇam tulyam ubhayoḥ prājña turyayoḥ

original: bījanidrāyutaḥ prājñaḥ sā ca turye na vidyate //
analyzed: bīja nidrā yutaḥ prājñaḥ sā ca turye na vidyate
verse
svapna nidrā yutau ādyau prājñaḥ tu asvapna nidrayā

original: na nidrāṃ naiva ca svapnaṃ turye paśyanti niścitāḥ //
analyzed: na nidrām nā eva ca svapnam turye paśyanti niścitāḥ
verse
anyathā gṛhṇataḥ svapnaḥ nidrā tattvam a jānataḥ
viparyāse tayoḥ kṣīṇe turīyam padam aśnute
verse
anādi māyayā suptaḥ yadā jīvaḥ prabudhyate
ajam anidram asvapnam advaitam budhyate tadā
verse

original: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: prapañcaḥ yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ
māyā mātram idam dvaitam advaitam paramārthataḥ
verse
vikalpaḥ vinivarteta kalpitaḥ yadi kenacid

original: upadeśādayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate //
analyzed: upadeśāt ayam vādaḥ jñāte dvaitam na vidyate
māṇḍūkyaḥ upaniṣad
verse
saḥ yam ātmā adhyakṣaram oṅkāraḥ dhimātram

original: pādā mātrā mātrāśca pādā akāra ukāro makāra iti //
analyzed: pādāḥ mātrāḥ mātrāḥ ca pādāḥ akāraḥ ukāraḥ makāraḥ iti
verse
jāgarita sthānaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ kāraḥ prathamā
mātrā āpteḥ ādimat tvāt vā āpnoti ha vai sarvān
kāma anādiḥ ca bhavati yaḥ evam veda
verse
svapna sthānaḥ taijasaḥ ukāraḥ dvitīyā mātrā utkarṣāt
ubhaya tvāt vā utkarṣati ha vai jñāna santatim samānaḥ ca

original: bhavati nāsyābrahmavitkule bhavati ya evaṃ veda //
analyzed: bhavati na asya a brahma vid kule bhavati yaḥ evam veda
verse
suṣupta sthānaḥ prājñaḥ makāraḥ tṛtīyā mātrā miteḥ apīteḥ vā

original: minoti ha vā idaṃ sarvamapītiśca bhavati ya evaṃ veda //
analyzed: minoti ha vai idam sarvam apītiḥ ca bhavati yaḥ evam veda
māṇḍūkya kārikā
verse
mātrā saṃpratipattau syāt āpti sāmānyam eva ca
verse
taijasasya ūtva vijñāne utkarṣaḥ dṛśyate sphuṭam
mātrā saṃpratipattau syāt ubhaya tvam tathāvidham
verse
makāra bhāve prājñasya māna sāmānyam utkaṭam
mātrā saṃpratipattau tu laya sāmānyam eva ca
verse

original: triṣu dhāmasu yastulyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetti niścitaḥ /
analyzed: triṣu dhāmasu yaḥ tulyam sāmānyam vetti niścitaḥ
sa pūjyaḥ sarva bhūtānām vandyaḥ ca eva mahā muniḥ
verse
akāraḥ nayate viśvam ukāraḥ ca api taijasam

original: makāraśca punaḥ prājñaṃ nāmātre vidyate gatiḥ //
analyzed: makāraḥ ca punar prājñam nāma atre vidyate gatiḥ
māṇḍūkyaḥ upaniṣad
verse
amātraḥ caturthaḥ vyavahāryaḥ prapañca upaśamaḥ śivaḥ dvaita

original: evamoṅkāra ātmaiva saṃviśatyātmanātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda /
analyzed: evam oṅkāraḥ ātmā eva saṃviśati ātmanā ātmānam yaḥ evam veda
yaḥ evam veda
māṇḍūkya kārikā
verse

original: oṅkāraṃ pādaśo vidyātpādā mātrā na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: oṅkāram pādaśas vidyāt pādāḥ mātrāḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: oṅkāraṃ pādaśo jñātvā na kiñcidapi cintayet //
analyzed: oṅkāram pādaśas jñātvā na kiñcid api cintayet
verse

original: yuñjīta praṇave cetaḥ praṇavo brahma nirbhayam /
analyzed: yuñjīta praṇave cetaḥ praṇavaḥ brahma nirbhayam

original: praṇave nityayuktasya na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit //
analyzed: praṇave nitya yuktasya na bhayam vidyate kvacid
verse

original: praṇavo hyaparaṃ brahma praṇavaśca paraḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: praṇavaḥ hi aparam brahma praṇavaḥ ca paraḥ smṛtaḥ
apūrvaḥ nantaraḥ bāhyaḥ na paraḥ praṇavaḥ vyayaḥ
verse
sarvasya praṇavaḥ hi ādiḥ madhyam antaḥ tathā eva ca

original: evaṃ hi praṇavaṃ jñātvā vyaśnute tadanantaram //
analyzed: evam hi praṇavam jñātvā vyaśnute tad anantaram
verse
praṇavam hi īśvaram vidyāt sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitam
sarva vyāpinam oṅkāram matvā dhīraḥ na śocati
verse
amātraḥ nanta mātraḥ ca dvaitasya upaśamaḥ śivaḥ

original: oṅkāro vidito yena sa munirnetaro janaḥ //
analyzed: oṅkāraḥ viditaḥ yena sa muniḥ na itaraḥ janaḥ
